website_summaries.verdict: While this cover has a few quality concerns, it also earns praise for its thick 5-layer design. We think it has more to offer when it comes to protecting your vehicle that any other on today's market.
pros: A high-end cover that's available in a variety of sizes fitting sedans up to 204 inches in length
Has 5 protective layers including a soft fleece lining
cons: There have been a few reported quality issues, including peeling layers and occasional leaks when used in rain

customer_reviews.title: Bad cover. No warranty. No returns. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Cover came apart at the seams 3 months after receiving it. Manufacturer said it was not returnable as too much time had past. Bad cover, bad manufacturer, bad warranty. I learned my lesson the hard way. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbyb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is amazing for the price! It wasn’t a ‘snug fit’ as amazon garage stated, but it sure did fit! From top to bottom, couldn’t be happier! My car is an all black 2013 Camaro SS, and it’s hard to keep clean, this cover helps keep anything off the car! The material is well made, doesn’t feel cheap! I highly recommend it. Even comes with a lock and key!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, came with lock and key
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my bf and he seemed pleased. It even came with a lock and key which was cool. You can throw strap under car and lock on other side which is great against theft. And price couldn't be better. Waterproof. A darker color would of been bettee, but only beige was available
customer_reviews.author: justliz

customer_reviews.title: I like the built in straps under the front and rear
customer_reviews.text: used this on an 89 pontiac firebird . I like the built in straps under the front and rear . I was not worried about a snug fit although front and rear is perfecr . The sides fit all the way down , good to keep the sun off of the tires .
customer_reviews.author: claw

customer_reviews.title: a locking cable is nowatch for a slit car cover
customer_reviews.text: I had to change the tie points to brass grommets with a double leather backing (sewn in.). wind in North Las Vegas kind of intense. I also replaced the cable with rope. a locking cable is no watch for a slit car cover. no security at all and the cable can chip the car's paint.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: It is a little bigger than necessary but works just fine. Price is more than OK for the product
customer_reviews.text: This cover protects my husband's 1968 Mustang perfectly. It is a little bigger than necessary but works just fine. Price is more than OK for the product. He's very happy with it and it went on easily. I helped a little.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific product. Since my car is always parked outside
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product.Since my car is always parked outside,this cover keeps it clean.Also great during winter snow and ice,easy to clean off the tarp,remove and reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Romeo

customer_reviews.title: good weight, will handle the wind
customer_reviews.text: Much more than I expected, good weight, will handle the wind, very easy to put on. This is for indoor or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality/ baggy fit
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months, rear clip has torn off from wind, and cover has torn a hole from the clip breaking and allowing wind underneath the cover. Cover is also very baggy and does not fit tightly even when adjusting the clips. I would not recommend this cover as it is very cheaply fabricated and did not even last me one winter season. Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: ... year in use this is what the cover looks like. Seems to only be good for very short ...
customer_reviews.text: After one year in use this is what the cover looks like. Seems to only be good for very short term use. Faded and ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Klingler

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2011 Ford Mustang Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 204" version, and I was skeptical at first of how well this thing would protect my car from the weather here in Florida... and it did the job! My mustang is black so having a cover gets rid of the annoying water spots every morning. Also when it rains, the water just beads up on the top and my car remains 100% dry. Definitely the most bang for your buck with OxGord, some fitted covers go for upwards of 200 dollars, but this one did the trick. 10/10 would cover car again
customer_reviews.author: Nick Naverud

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage protection cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover is well manufactured and has the needed straps , grommets , etc to secure it to the car. Inside material seems to be soft and easy on paint but time will tell. The fit for my car was exact and for the price this cover is great value. Its supposed to be a breathable cover but I'm using this inside of a non heated shop to protect a car with a new paint job so direct contact with outside rain and wind was less of a concern.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Piper

customer_reviews.title: I cant believe how great this is for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I moved to a place where I no longer have sealed covered garage. My carport while giving sun protection. Still let's water rain all over my 2002 Mustang GT. I bought the slightly larger then recommend size and it's perfect. No water got threw even after a massive storm for days. Pulled the cover off and the car was still fresh and clean just like when I detailed it. For the money you simply can't beat it. Also came with locks and straps to keep It on.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Saiger

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I purchased thinking I was paying for quality. Had a day worth of rain. As another buyer mentioned it left milky white stains on my 71 cutlass. I didn't have money to repaint the car so I am stuck with the stains. Hopefully they can be buffed out so they won't be so obvious.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought because it said it had a lifetime warranty, 6 months in the top fabric started to come off. Called both Won Lane and OxGord and got the same customer no service person who said it only had a 2 month warranty and was not meant for outside use all contrary to anything posted on the web and on any review site. They finally agreed to replace if I sent pictures but never sent the email link and wanted to charge me $15 for shipping. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS COVER!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Jeffares

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband 1972 Cutlass S - Researched a lot of them and decided on this one. It's a great fit, very sturdy and all around great cover. He's VERY picky and this was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: E Henry

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item a couple of years ago. The first time we used it, after only a couple of days the wind blew resulting in one strap coming completely unattached and the cover flapping everywhere. I repaired the strap, put the cover back on and the wind blew it off again, so I gave up. Deciding to try again, using rope to tie it on the car, when unfolding the cover I found the outside layer is flaking off. It looks like aqua colored dust everywhere. I don't know if the other layers will protect the car or not. I guess we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, my husband's car is covered well and safe ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my husband's car is covered well and safe from most of the elements like rain, wind, sun, small hail, & light snow fall.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan D Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% waterproof and not for use outdoors. Read on for details.
customer_reviews.text: First, the item sent was labeled as expected, but was way oversized compared to description. Was able to exchange for the next smaller size which was slightly small for the vehicle (2004 Buick LeSabre), but worked. However, the 100% waterproof is a joke, and after less than 5 months of outdoor exposure, the five layers have turned to a powdery residue left on the car each time the cover is removed, and the cover itself has changed in color from a neutral gray to a urine yellow. Would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Max H. Herr

customer_reviews.title: Might be OK if car is indoors, but not outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: Have had the cover on the car outside for about 6 months. Where the cover goes over the mirrors is showing signs of considerable wear and will probably have holes before the cover is a year old. Does not keep the dirt off of the car well and absorbs a ton of water making it heavy as hell to take off wet. UPDATE: Less than a year old and the thing is falling apart! Large holes around the mirrors and tore along the car's body line when putting on and adjusting. Now I have to look for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Werth

customer_reviews.title: cheap stuff bag, flimsy sewing of straps
customer_reviews.text: fits my 2011 BMS 550I reasonably well, as you'd expect for a generic cover. straps under front and rear of car hold it on during wind. waterproof. will have to see how it does with snow. big disappointment is the cheap stuff bag, which tore the first time I tried to put the cover in it. Update. After using it for a few months, I was happy with it until 2 nights ago when 40 mph winds tore both straps off the cover. They were sewed in with 1 loop of thread!!! I will probably be able to sew them back on, but this is certainly a poor quality product in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the cost! Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2011 challenger pretty well, just a little short of covering the whole bumper on one end. It is a pain to snap under the car, I have to lay on the ground to reach under the car to connect the ends. The ring rivets in the middle have an extremely chintzy string that broke with a tug. After covering for 3 months in the fall, It did have some moisture on the windows, I’m assuming from sweating with temperature change by the car was dry and clean. I think it’s a great cover for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbijo83

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: We have used this car cover for almost a year. It works fine. Rain does penetrate through the cover over time. It's not too bad. We are getting some wet spots after heavy rain. We don't live in area with significant snowfall, so I can't comment about snow or prolonged subfreezing temperatures. The car cover is easy to use if you figure out the technique of rolling the cover on and off. You can do it by yourself in less than a minute. The car cover works as intended. It's so much better than leaving my car exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: K & S

customer_reviews.title: Expected better package
customer_reviews.text: My car I bought this for is in the garage for maintenance. So can't address the quality of the product, yet! Very heavy package. Came in only a plastic bag, granted a heavy duty mailer type- had several holes in plastic and one end was open! Could reach in and feel product, unable to remove from the side due to bulk of product. Very surprised at package, since Amazon is so concerned about integrity of packages.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Low initial cost; you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Fit seems to mean will cover or drape over your vehicle since the cover size is quite large (about 2 ft too long and the sides of touch the ground) but not necessarily snugly fit. After just under 2.5 years of outdoor use (sun and rain only no snow) the cover is disintegrating. It literally fell apart and heavy rain turns the material into powder. You could rip the material with one finger. Seams have fallen apart as well. Not a good quality product but it's a good initial price. After a year I noticed it's not waterproof. I should should have taken what I paid and spent more for a better quality product ~ lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: The Batman

customer_reviews.title: Significant issues with sizing
customer_reviews.text: So far the cover seems to work as advertised but I’m only giving it 3stars because the sizing was pretty well off. It’s much longer than it should be for our car model and as a result we needed to use an additional rope across the car to keep it in place, especially it there was any wind. Also the front and back straps were way too short to even attach one side to the other. They are supposed to snug down the front and back but if they can’t reach, they are worthless. So again we had to improvise to keep the cover in place. We’ll see just how well it holds up over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Made of heavy material
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed car cover. It perfectly fits my 2010 Honda Accord Crosstour. Really need 2 people to put it on. Pros: very durable, high grade materials; back side is soft & feels like flannel. Cons: Heavy & bulky so it isn’t easily foldable & storable; underside of cover froze to car & flannel-like backing stuck to car. It cannot be folded up, takes up most of the back of car in a 30 gallon garage bag for storage. it is heavy & bulky & a job for 2 people to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Each Day is a Gift

customer_reviews.title: Decently fitting cover for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the 1979 Trans Am, and it fits quite nicely. It arrived quickly, and has kept the newly-detailed car quite clean. Much sturdier than the old single-ply nylon cover it replaced, and does a much better job of keeping dust off the black finish. Ordering by year and model reassured me that it would fit. The price was decent too. The cover will not be used outside, so water resistance won't be much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon73

customer_reviews.title: Black Paint discoloration
customer_reviews.text: Received the product to cover my black Honda Accord coupe. It fit the car fine a little big but that was expected based on the car being on the short end of the size range. Had the car covered for 3 days and we had a couple rain showers. Upon removing the cover I had paint discoloration on the rear passenger side fender. I tried buffing the discoloration out and it seems to be improving but not sure I dare cover the car now....
customer_reviews.author: David W1

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, fits my 2018 Civic Coupe.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my 2018 Honda Civic Coupe. (2door) I've not had it for a full year, but am very pleased with it so far. My car is black, meaning all the hours washing, claying, and waxing can be undone in just a couple of days. I don't have a garage, so the cover has been a real plus in keeping my car looking nice. I live in Oregon, the pollen levels here have been exceptional. So this in my opinion, was a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JimTele

customer_reviews.title: Car Cover only lasted 23 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car cover just less than 2 year's ago.. It was designed to fit my Pontiac Firebird and it did. My car is always parked outside. I live in Southern California along the beach. You would think that my car cover would last several years but no. It has only lasted 23 months. If your car is parked in a garage its a great product. If your car is outdoors limited life span. One great advantage this car cover has over some it comes with straps to lock down the cover front and rear. It's wonderful. It will not blow away. You also have a lock and cable for theft.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Way too big, not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: They advertised it as fitting my car that is 181" long. I didn't read the fine print that this is around 205" long. Yes it fits but has 24" of overhang. I would not call that a "fit" they should be more specific in the vehicles that this "fits" oh and since it's not sold by Amazon, you will be paying the shipping to return it to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!!!! The elastic ripped the first night it was on! Plus the bag that it came in ripped too! Terrible! Immediately going to return this junk of a product and get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Still evaluating......
customer_reviews.text: So far, these do a good job of protecting our cars. The water resistance isnt too bad. There were some spots where water soaked through after a heavy rain. Cant rate durability yet, need more time. Does an good job of keeping the cars cool inside during hot summer. We will see how it holds up during the NE Pennsylvania winte.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Almost a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put on and take off. Does a wonderful job of keeping my black car clean and cooler in the Las Vegas heat. Unfortunately, the heavy duty, double stitching used in assembling the cover itself was not carried through to attaching the straps that keep the cover on when it's windy. Mine lasted two or three weeks before the front strap came off. Now my cover is sitting in my trunk waiting for me to figure out a way to fix it. Such a shame - 95% of the way to a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D Ward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the cover is very good. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was the size of the unit. While the web site said it fit my Honda Civic, the cover swallows my car. It covers the car, but touches the ground all the way around. Regardless, I would recommend this cover, just check the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof or dust proof.  Terrible fit despite being ordered for a particular car.  Bought year ago still works in NC death
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Coming on to a year of outdoor parking. Not waterproof or dust proof. Protects paint well, but does let water and fine dust through. Would have given it 5 starts if it was a better fit. I ordered it specifically for my BMW e24 635csi. It is about 2 feet too long and hangs over the hood of the car...very irritating as bugs, leaves get into it.
customer_reviews.author: RedlineV8

customer_reviews.title: Good car cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 car covers for a couple of Mustangs I own. 1965 & 1966. Good covers, they have carrying or storage cases which is a nice addition compared to covers I have purchased for the other cars. The covers for the Mustangs are way larger than the car, not a form fit or even close. However they are a pretty good cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: This product fit my 2013 Chevy Camaro perfectly. I purposeful spilled water on the cover and was happy when the water beaded up and rolled right off. The material is lightweight yet durable. I was really satisfied with the cost and value I received for my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NL_Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 2007 mustang but does cover completely tires and all.
customer_reviews.text: Better than too tight better for airflow just snug the straps which is nice added feature most dont come with.Good weight 5 layer and for 50 bucks-cant beat it.Seen many like this for twice as much or more.Maybe add couple bungees only thing not getting form fitting-so what.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence

customer_reviews.title: You all are false advertising and are thieves!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: More false advertising!!!!! Lies about 7 layers of this,or that. Water resistant etc.!!!!!! Every time it rained or snowed my car was wet underneath!!!!!!!! How,do you dogs feel stealing hard earned money from good people just to make a dollar???!!! It will be your turn someday!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen F.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this cover for 2-3 weeks but I’m very pleased with it. However the cover is way too big for the car I purchased it for, but it fits fine on a 2nd larger car that I’m using it on. It has elastic on the ends as well as straps and the grommets on the sides can be used to help hold the cover in windy conditions. The front strap isn’t useable as the front tires are in the way. I’m using it outside under a carport so I don’t know how waterproof it is.
customer_reviews.author: MCMT

customer_reviews.title: I will not use it again
customer_reviews.text: They gave me a size much bigger than the one I ordered, so I had to tie everything that was left over in the end. And after returning from a month of vacation I found a big stain in the paint, which was not washed out by washing the car. I had to repaint that part. I'm not sure if the cover was the culprit, but I can not think that anything else could be, because before leaving on vacation there was no stain.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised. It has been thru several days of rain and high wind with great success. There was no soaking through of the outside material. It fit my Monte Carlo just fine. For the price, it has been a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G

customer_reviews.title: The  cover that almost was............
customer_reviews.text: Received in the mail, looks like it was a great cover. Used it in moving car from AZ to IL, strapped in down on the car towing it behind a moving truck, cover never made it past 2 miles before it ripped right off the car. Wish they would of said "don't put on a car that's in movement" . Lesson learned I guess, the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: William Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: nice cover for price
customer_reviews.text: great cover just wish it had tie down straps instead of the little shoe string tie down they supplied
customer_reviews.author: Pinpete

customer_reviews.title: Huge. Does not fit Mercedes C300
customer_reviews.text: This is not a suitable cover for my Mercedes C300. The material is dragging on the dirty pavement and the wind wants to create a sail and blow away, seriously, this would easily fit a large SUV. Why is This seller advertising this as suitable for my car model? Don’t buy if you have a smallish car!
customer_reviews.author: LISA N

customer_reviews.title: Helped alot BUT
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first few times but snow and rain constantly the water would go through it and my car would be wet. And I was taking it off one day and grabbed at the seam and it ripped open. So not every sturdy and with too much rain and water sitting on it not ever water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Samica

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Is Awesome....Wherever have I been
customer_reviews.text: 😅🤪🎥 I love the way it came in a plastic sucked up package. Then ooooo 🤔🤥🤫🤭 about a tiny bag to put it in after to take it off.....Ok first when u take it off it is snowed on and how how hard it is to take it off and dry it off ..........RRReeeeeeeeelllllllleeeeeee$!!Put it in this small package......Just alitte humor for the Holiday.......Awesome product.....awesome quality.............Berryyyyyyyyyyyyyyy big for tiny baggage 🤑
customer_reviews.author: L.Y.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car cover that is light weight, yet heavy built. It fits nicely over the car and has straps on the front and rear that go under and clip together so as the cover keeps from blowing off when it gets windy out. Overall, it is a nice cover for a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put on light weight and fit very well. I was able to attach small cords to the front and sides to keep it from lifting. It fit over the cyclone great. And is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the good guys
customer_reviews.text: I bought from this seller before these car covers work very well for my classic car in the backyard. after 6 years the wind got under it and tore it some , other than that very durable and long-lasting. Would definitely recommend this seller an this car cover
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant and durable as well as easily storeable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought it for a Toyota Camry It completely covers the car and I live in Florida where it rains a lot and it’s very humid. It wicks all the moisture and have not had any mold or algae buildup on it yet and I’ve had it for 2 1/2 months.. Definitely buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DTF407

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy and Cumbersome to Store in Bag
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and not easy to fold to place back in storage bag. I don't even use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: 4mode

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it did not fit the vehicle I ordered it for, but did work on the cab and canopy for my truck. These are reliable reasonable priced covers, should get me through 6 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rock Bunny

customer_reviews.title: A heavy car cover
customer_reviews.text: I could not use it. It was way to heavy for me to manage. It was made well, but if you small, you many not be able to handle it. I could not pack it to send back, so I had to donate it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality/ And it't not water proof.
customer_reviews.text: IN SIX MONTHS. THATS ALL IT TOOK. THIS WAS BY FAR THE BIGGEST PIECE OF JUNK I'VE EVER PURCHASED. IF YOU TOUCH IT. IT WILL TEAR. I THOUGHT MY CORVETTE WAS PROTECTED. ( NOT )
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Came with clips and straps and I suppose if you want to use it outdoors that's helpful HOWEVER if you want to protect your paint
customer_reviews.text: Large. A bit too large. Came with clips and straps and I suppose if you want to use it outdoors that's helpful HOWEVER if you want to protect your paint job-not good as they clank and hit your car upon removal and putting on. Because of that you need someone else there to make sure clips don't hit your car. Using it on classic car in garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The cover performed as advertised. It kept the leaves and other debris off my car during a very windy fall season. In general I would say it did a very good job at protecting my car. It was easy to put on and take off. So far, the price appears to be about right and the product is relatively sturdy. It has worked out well so far and hopefully I'll get a few more years of good solid use (performance) out of . So far pretty pleased! Got my money's worth..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who stopped the rain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover for my new Mercedes E350 that I had just got detailed and waxed and then here comes the rain. I quickly covered the Mercedes with my new cover and after the rain stopped, checked for leaks and smudges and found no problems. I like it and it’s something my wife can install also so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Good cover but the straps are too short
customer_reviews.text: The cover works well and is sturdy. My only complaint is that the straps that go underneath the car to hold it down are not long enough. I had to extend the one under the rear with a bungee cord on a 2013 Camaro. That is the reason I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: That it cover rain and dirt off your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my car. It's a little too big and long, but now that I have it,I love it a lot. It covers the body of my car and tires. I have a little bulldog in the back yard and she stirs up dust like a dirt doberman. But now that I have this cover, No, dust is on my car at ALL. I'm so glad that when I go places I won't have too wipes my car now every time I go somewhere. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annette G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughters grandparents bought her a brand New Hyundai sonata for 16 bday.. my daughter wanted to keep it clean and good shape. This cover works great! No problems getting it off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Good car cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great car cover! Past orders the cover has had a front and a back strap with attaching clip ends. This order the car cover had neither a front strap or a back strap nor attaching clip ends. So I had to order strapping and clips. By hand I sewed a front and a back strap with clip ends, that's four sewing attachments to the car cover plus two clip end attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO UPDATE FIT GUIDE
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is universal but it fits my 02 camry like a xxxL on a medium size person. The sides are on the floor 😕 feels extremely thin not sure how it will hold up. Staps on front wont reach across.
customer_reviews.author: I shop Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what you see
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit or look as pictured. No spots for mirrors to fit as in the photo and none of the locks were included in the package as the description said it would. Looks more like a huge bed sheet draped over the car and yes I did verify my car model and year to make sure it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: shakeila bogle-duke

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous car cover!
customer_reviews.text: This car cover was a Christmas gift for a friend. He was so excited about it and constantly lets me know how perfect it is....his new car is still like new even though he needs to park outside.
customer_reviews.author: MissEeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the recipient was very pleased with it. It is working well to protect a car that is not garaged.
customer_reviews.author: holyconfusion

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my third car cover and is the "charm". The first car cover was one more expensive (but didn't last but 3 years) and didn't have water protection. The second car cover was a "cheap" one and after 2 years, ripped apart. This 3rd one, is the thickest, water resistant and good at protecting from dirt and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Moffett Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We got this cover for a car we keep outside and so far it’s working good keeping ice and snow out! The only thing I had a hard time figuring out how to tie it down!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The cover got caught in a wind gust & tore the nylon strap loose where it was stitched to the cover. I had to sew it back & reinforce it. Overall a great value !
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is amazing I bought it for my son as a Xmas gift for his Cadillac and it’s has been through several storms already on the east coast. Easy to use fast to put on and take off, well made congrats great product...
customer_reviews.author: OrazioMan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This cover has exceeded my expectations in keeping my best in class station wagon dry during rain storms and not scratching the car surface even while the wind shifts it about. Driver side door zipper is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: colonel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty.  Good Protection. Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Material is good and should be non-scratching. BUT it's much too large even though I specified make and model of car. I just have to secure it with more straps which makes removal difficult. Good price for Oxgord.
customer_reviews.author: Research1

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car cover as I recently used it during a severe T storm and it performed perfectly! I’ve bought 2 other car covers that weren’t nearly as good as this one. I wish I had come across this business earlier before purchasing the other car covers from the other companies. This cover covers a Maserati GranTurismo convertible so nothing second rate will even get near my car. 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: James Shortley

customer_reviews.title: Keep my equipment drier than astronaut ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I recently bought this to cover some sensitive moon landing equipment. It worked like a charm. I had two feet of snow on the equipment during a winter in the Rockies and it when I removed the cover this spring it was a dry as space ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: doer-

customer_reviews.title: solid cover
customer_reviews.text: It is a great cover& protects my car. It isn't very light - meaning protective -and it took a little time to learn the beat ways to install. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: garded

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this is really a good cover. for a car that stays in a garage it is perfect for the price. seems durable and had good banding to secure under the car.
customer_reviews.author: armedanddangerous

customer_reviews.title: Not only is it not remotely close to a glove ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it not remotely close to a glove fit it isn't waterproof either. Put this on my Saab convertible but it would probably fit my Crew Cab truck. Water goes right throught it. Huge mistake buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ruckus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Secure the belts, the wind will raise the cover.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cover because I have a convertible top that leaks. Putting this on by myself takes about 15 minutes. I suggest figuring out how to adjust the belts/clasp before covering. Also you will need to secure the under sides with heavier rope.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover very thick but light weight. Only been on car for a week. Fits a little loose, but straps are great. Very windy location. Will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps car dry
customer_reviews.text: Great cover bought it for my firebird. Fits nice and snug, doesnt come off when wind blows. Keeps my car clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: weather protection
customer_reviews.text: the cover fitted better than i expected, perfect in width and length, not too tight and gives room for adjustment, very happy with it, now i will send for the lock package, it does come with under car straps, and they are great, the lock is for security reasons.
customer_reviews.author: T.H. SOUTH CAL

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought another model that was supposed to fit my car. It didn't, and was very shabbily made. I returned it and bought this cover, and have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyS

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1968 Dodge Dart. I bought the 204". My car is 196" long and 73" wide. This was a perfect fit. It was a bit of a pain to find exactly where to cut for the antenna. Product feels heavy duty and well put together. We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Started coming apart on the roof after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: This cover didn’t last me a year. I live in the south so it didn’t go through a winter of freezing. The roof portion started coming apart a couple months ago. Now it is totally disintegrating daily.
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife's brand new camry to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's brand new camry to keep the paint from fading and peeling. I wasn't sure which size would fit so I bought the extra larger size instead. And when i got it! I went to put it on the car it was a little larger than I what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vang

customer_reviews.title: Don't Recommend....
customer_reviews.text: This product is very heavy and difficult to put on for one person. The seams tore in two different places the second time I used it. Dirt gets trapped and every time I use it there is a thick dirt film on my car. Not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This cover is not tightly fitting like those that are custom made for a specific car. But it is large enough for either of our midsize cars and made of a high quality material. I find that it is easier to put on than those that fit closer.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wright

customer_reviews.title: Way More than I Expected!!
customer_reviews.text: This car cover is exceptionally high quality for the price. It’s more than large enough to cover my 2016 Dodge Charger and the inner flocking is soft and protects against scratches. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a good car cover to protect your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nic B.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Terrible car cover. Way too big for car as listed. Only had on car for three months and wind split it in half up the seams. Poor quality. No return or exchange after 30 days. Not even waterproof as listed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Ankuda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Functions well. It protects my car from the sun and elements and the nearby plants that plague my driveway. It is slightly difficult to fold up and store but its do-able.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in under 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Cover completely fell apart in under 2 years. Top layer started to flake off then the rest of the cover seemed to turn into tissue paper. Never seen anything like it. You can see this in the pictures of other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for my 94 Camaro Z28. Definitely protected from elements, tie down straps are good too. No issues so far, have been using for 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I park my car in my driveway, since I am not able to use my garage. The OxGord cover has a soft inside which prevents your car from scratching, even if it has some dust. A tie down was included, which helps for those windy says. I park next to a sprinkler, so this cover has saved my cars paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Berumen

customer_reviews.title: Not quite long enough almost
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my es350 2018 very well not quite long enough to fit under the bumper and the front of the car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to cover my 1976 Cadillac Seville. Due to heavy wind I had to get this product and it hasn’t failed me yet. Easy to put on the car and it latches on very tightly so the wind can’t blow it off. We just had heavy snow fall and the cover stood up great. I recommend this product to anyone looking to keep their car covered and safe for the weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It says it fits my vehicle , about 80 percent of my vehicle. The straps don't reach top click together. I had to use the string to tie the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy Delivery on time
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around to see what was out there and found more than one from company`s listed at Amazon. Very wide price ranges and found this cover had much more than I needed but at a low price. It is built good and has a storage bag also. It fits my car, not a form fit and no corvette emblems but do not need it or the extra hundred dollars or so for them. This is a great cover for storage or just covering the car if parked outside. I am very happy with it and am sure it will serve my needs for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this daily for his car. Without it the vehicle leaks with any rainstorm but it definitely does the job we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Mom

product_meta.title: OxGord Signature Car Cover - 100 Water-Proof 5 Layers - True Mastepiece - Ready-Fit Semi Glove Fit - Fits up to 204 Inches
product_meta.description:
Provide top of the line protection for your car with the 6-layer Water-resistant Signature Car Cover from OxGord.

Designed for both indoor and outdoor use. Our covers are perfect for storing vehicles in a garage, parking on a driveway, or a tree-lined street.

PROTECTION: Fully cover your vehicle to protect its exterior and paint from the elements, dust, dirt, wind, rain, snow, sleet, ice, debris, liquids, leaves, tree sap, mud, storms, scratches, smudges, harmful UV rays, and more.

PREVENTION: Covering your automobile will help prevent rust and corrosion.

EASY TO USE: Our cover will easily fit over your car. Once you're ready for a drive on the open road, simply remove the cover, fold it, then stow it away inside the included storage pouch.

FEATURES:

- Reinforced seams
- Breathable fabric
- Elastic hems& drawstrings
- Storage bag
- Antenna patch
- Tie down security grommets
- Water-resistant
- Scratch resistant
- Rip-resistant

Warranty: Includes a 1-year limited manufacturer warranty.

Use the tie downs to tightly secure the cover onto your automobile.

Our signature car covers are available in multiple sizes. Please measure your car to ensure that this is the right size cover for your vehicle.

We also sell a wide variety of high-quality exterior and interior auto parts & accessories for cars, trucks, vans, SUV's, ATV's, UTV's, and motorcycles.

See other OxGord products to fulfill all of your automotive accessory needs..
feature_bullets: 5 Layer Protection: Water resistant with 3 layers of spunbound polypropylene, 1 layer micro-porous film, and 1 layer soft fleece
Protect & Preserve: Extra layers for durability, insulation against heat & UV rays, and soft fleece to protect your paint job
Includes: Storage bag, antenna patch, and tie down security grommets for high winds and lock to prevent theft lock
Features: Reinforced seams, superior breathability, front and rear elastic hems & draw strings to ensure a snug semi-glove fit
Dimensions: 204.75 Inches long x 0.1 inches thick, and 53.25 inches wide - fits up to 204 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,208 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
